title: Inside Real Madrid: Is Xabi Alonso still facing the sack? - The Athletic
snippet: Despite the loss against City, Alonsos dismissal was not seriously considered last night.

title: Inside Real Madrid: Have Vinicius Jr and Rodrygo saved Xabi Alonso from the sack? - The Athletic
snippet: It was the latest example of Alonsos efforts to be closer to Vinicius Jr, who went over to the manager to celebrate Rodrygos winner and hugged him when he was substituted in the 89th minute. When asked about the improvement in their relationship, those closest to the Brazilian pointed out how, since the Olympiacos game on November 26, the coach has been substituting Vinicius Jr less, and later on in games when he has done it. title: Xabi Alonso: "Eleven Real Madrid players will take the field tomorrow to give their all"

title: Xabi Alonso: Real Madrid boss granted stay of execution after loss - BBC Sport
snippet: Alonso's Real Madrid future uncertain after Man City defeat - analysis 路 ByShamoon Hafez, Football reporter at the Bernabeu and Guillem Balague, BBC Sport Columnist 路 Published 路 11 December 2025 路 727 Comments 路 The deafening jeers that greeted former Barcelona boss Pep Guardiola before kick-off turned into away-fan cheers after Manchester City picked up a magnificent Champions League victory at Real Madrid that leaves Xabi Alonso clinging on to his job.

title: Real Madrid boss Xabi Alonso backed by Jude Bellingham but facing uncertain future after Man City defeat | Football News | Sky Sports
snippet: Real Madrid were beaten 2-1 by Man City at the Bernabeu in the Champions League as they suffered back-to-back home defeats to raise the pressure on Xabi Alonso, whose side have won just twice in their last eight games, but Jude Bellingham says ...
